reviewText: This movie is an exception from many angles. The music is so captivating and sweet that one wants to listen it again and again. Sahir Ludhianvi has contributed the words to its songs that one wonders, how the words put life in the music and makes you understand complex problems in a very simple and direct way. Lastly the evergreen personalities of Ashok Kumar, Pradeep Kumar, Meena Kumari and Mehmood make this movie a rare gem of cinema. I feel lucky to possess the DVD of this movie as my personal collection.
PLAYED BY THE MOVIE STARS SUCH AS ASHOK,PRADEEP,MEENA KUMARI AND EVERGREEN COMEDIAN MEHMOOD OF GUMNAM. FULL OF DRAMA,SONGS AND THE MUSIC BY ONE OF THE VETERANS AS ROSHAN.

This video is recorded for India consumers. It will not play on any USA DVD players. It appears that this dvd was bought cheaply in bulk in India and are being sold here in the US...It will not play on your dvd player...
